titles.title: No Pay Raise for Congress Act of 2012
No Pay Raise for Congress Act of 2012
A bill to provide that Members of Congress shall not receive a cost of living adjustment in pay during 2013.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

bill.summary: No Pay Raise for Congress Act of 2012 - Eliminates automatic cost of living (COLA) adjustments for Members of Congress during FY2013.
